attributes.action: A BILL OF RIGHTS FOR NATURE
attributes.additional_details: We petition the government to support a defining legislation that protects and sustains the environment in the form of a ‘Rights of Nature’ Bill to address the rebalancing of 'Corporate Interests' versus that of 'Eco-Systems Rights'. In short, Nature cannot speak up for itself, so we must speak for Nature, and future generations, before it is too late. Climate change can be solved – what is needed is the political will for action. Thank you for supporting this petition.
